content: It appears that the referral system in this tax system breakdown offers a significant reduction in taxes for those who use it. The referral system also appears to benefit multiple different areas of the Endgame project, such as liquidity, RFV, and the Battle Royal Champion System. Additionally, a percentage of the tax is allocated to the reward token reflection, algorithmic chart management system, and the burning system. Finally, a small percentage is allocated to the rebaser wallet.
